full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MED LUGS KYI RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I MAndAL BZHI MCHOD DANG 'BREL BAR DPAL LDAN LHA MO MHOD TSUL GYI CHO GA GSAL BAR BKOD PA DGE LEGS 'DOD DGU'I DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
